---
title: "Topic Tables"
output: html_document
---

### Data being read in.
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
tm <- read.csv("../output/complaint-topics.csv")
colnames(tm) <- gsub('\\.', '_', tolower(colnames(tm)))
```

### Tabulate products.
```{r}
table(tm$product)
```

### Tabulate product by topics.
```{r}
table(tm$product, tm$topic)
table(tm$product, tm$topic) %>% prop.table(1) %>% round(4)
table(tm$product, tm$topic) %>% prop.table(2) %>% round(4)
```
